    Translate variables

    Adrian Maldet

    2019-09-16

    translate.Rmd

    Let df be a data frame with the following structure:

    str(df)
#> 'data.frame':    12 obs. of  4 variables:
#>  $ pupil_id: int  1 1 1 2 2 2 3 3 3 4 ...
#>  $ subject : chr  "eng" "mat" "gym" "eng" ...
#>  $ level   : Factor w/ 2 levels "a","b": 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 1 ...
#>  $ result  : num  1 2 2 NA 2 NA 1 0 1 2 ...

    The column subject (character) contains the subject codes the pupils were tested in and result (integer) contains the test results. The column level (factor) holds the levels of the attended courses.

    Further reading
